author: Tal Kopan, CNN
description: The Justice Department on Wednesday named Robert Mueller as special counsel to oversee the department's investigation into Russian meddling in the 2016 election. The former FBI director has a long history with investigations and prosecutions.
title: Who is Robert Mueller?

description: Robert Mueller was appointed by the Justice Department
title: Former FBI Chief Robert Mueller Appointed as Special Counsel to Oversee Russia Investigation

author: http://www.abc.net.au/news/ian-burrows/8090198
description: Robert Mueller is the perfect choice to lead an investigation into alleged Russian interference in the 2016 US election, biographer Garrett Graff says.
title: Robert Mueller the right man for the job of investigating Russia interference, biographer says

description: CNN's Jeffrey Toobin says that Robert Mueller is a great choice to be the special counsel investigating the Russia role in the 2016 election because he is highly respected by Republican and Democrats.
title: Toobin: Robert Mueller a brilliant choice - CNN Video

author: Kevin Johnson
description: The Justice Department tapped former FBI director Robert Mueller to be a special counsel overseeing the Russia investigation, the department announced Wednesday.
title: Justice Department taps former FBI Director Robert Mueller as special counsel for Russia investigation

author: Kevin Spain
description: Robert Mueller was tasked with evaluating whether NFL took proper steps on ex-Ravens RB Ray Rice.
title: Before Russia investigation, Robert Mueller oversaw probe into NFL's handling of Ray Rice case

author: Del Quentin Wilber
description: Former FBI Director Robert Mueller III was appointed as special counsel to oversee the FBI investigation of the Russian government’s efforts to influence the 2016 election, the Justice Department said.
title: Former FBI Director Robert Mueller Named Special Counsel for Russia Probe

description: Eine unabhängige Untersuchung soll die Vorwürfe gegen den Trump und sein Team prüfen. Zum Chef der Kommission ernennt das Ministerium Ex-FBI-Chef Robert Mueller.
title: Robert Mueller: US-Justizministerium beruft Sonderermittler für Russland-Affäre

author: Christoph von Marschall
description: Ex-FBI-Chef Robert Mueller untersucht potenzielle Moskau-Verbindungen. Er is ein unabhängiger Geist und ein guter Freund des gefeuerten James Comey. Eine Analyse.
title: Mit Robert Mueller wird es ungemütlich für Trump

author: http://xml.zeit.de/autoren/L/Carsten_Luther/index
description: Robert Mueller ist es gewohnt, Druck aus dem Weißen Haus standzuhalten. Mit dem Sonderermittler werden die Russland-Ermittlungen ernst. Wer er ist und was er darf
title: Robert Mueller: Von Trump wird er sich nichts sagen lassen
